name: Miyaji Shachou no Pachinko Fan: Shouri Sengen 2
overview: The sequel to POW's earlier Pachinko Fan: Shouri Sengen. The player is once again treated to a number of virtual pachinko boards with which to make their fortune in ball bearings. POW, or Planning Office Wada, published the game working with an unknown contract developer. The Pachinko Fan: Shouri Sengen series did not receive another sequel.
